title: The Jboy Show - The Case for a 12 Team Playoff
itunes:title: The Jboy Show - The Case for a 12 Team Playoff
description:
On today's show, Jboy discusses why this year proves we need a 12-team playoff, gives out his midseason awards, and makes 5 predictions for the second half of the year. Make sure to check us out LIVE on Youtube every day at 3pm EST, plus follow us @thejboyshow on all social media platforms.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
